abstract.para: This topic provides instructions on how to add and modify VPNs.

step.para: Click Add VPN in the Interfaces section.
A pop-up message, wireguard-tools will be installed. appears. You can view the size of wireguard-tools on the bottom right of the window.
The Add WireGuard VPN window appears.

Enter the following details,
Name
Name fo the VPN
Private Key
Generated : You can use the system generated key . To copy the key, click the copy icon. Both Private and Public keys are generated by the system if you select this option.
Paste existing key: Select this if you have a existing key. Enter the private key and th epublic key is generated automatically when you enter a valid private key.
Listen port
By default, the port is 0 which means that it is set to automatic. You can change this.
IPv4 addresses
Enter the IPv4 addresses. You can add multiple addresses using commas or spaces as delimiters.
Optionally click Add Peer to add new peers to the VPN.
Peers are other machines that connect with this one. Public keys from other machines will be shared with each other.
Endpoint acting as a server need to be specified as host:port, otherwise it can be left empty.
Optionally click Add Peer to add new peers to the VPN.
Enter the public key, endpoint and allowed IPs.
